body:
I saw I previous post by OPTOBAT about this but, even if I type in "Apollo" or "Mczone02" it comes up with "unknown host" like this: http://imgur.com/9ngBfQ6

Am I not doing it correctly? Please help!

title: Why Can't I Get On Avicus?

replies.body: It's ok, just give ivy some time , lots and lots of time. It may take a few days, but just be patient , just check back every 2-3 days. These things take lots of time and ivy is super super busy and it's our job to find alternate ways to join the server until things are back up .
replies.body_tagged: It's ok, just give ivy some time , lots and lots of time. It may take a few days, but just be patient , just check back every 2-3 days. These things take lots of time and ivy is super super busy and it's our job to find alternate ways to join the server until things are back up .

replies.body: Most people don't know about it yet

replies.body:
Yea, it's. like a mini game. "Join the hidden Avicus server" 

the object is to find your friend and play, without going to the hub.. ( Because its been mostly down for 2 days) Use only the ip addresses and command you have access to. It's fun!
